name: Watch Control - Game Jam Version
description:
I realized after the Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1 that my game wasn't actually uploaded, so here it is.

Thanks for checking out my game!

This is my project for Brackey's Game Jam 2021.1 - Stronger Together.  This is the first time I've ever made a game, and there were a lot of things I couldn't figure out before the deadline, so it's pretty janky and more of a 'basic interactive movie,' but I hope you'll be able to look past that and enjoy the idea.

The premise is that you are the Player and your essence goes to another Realm and meets Phyrna, the Character.  In this short game, you are able to both Watch and Control the Character (hence the super clever name Watch Control).

I wish I could've shown more of the story that I have come up with, but this ends up being just a Prologue-like thing.

Thank you for checking out my game and if you have any hope for seeing more of this game future, I am continuing work on it  because I like the idea.

Kaizarhiede
